mapper.update: MERGE INTO SYS0056M a USING ( SELECT #{authCode} AS auth_code , #{menuCode} AS menu_code , #{pgmTrnCode} AS pgm_trn_code , #{funcYn} AS func_yn , 0 AS user_id FROM dual ) b ON ( a.AUTH_CODE = b.auth_code AND a.menu_code = b.menu_code AND a.pgm_trn_code = b.pgm_trn_code ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET a.func_yn = b.func_yn , a.upd_user_id = b.user_id , a.upd_dt = sysdate WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( a.auth_code, a.menu_code, a.pgm_trn_code, a.func_yn, a.crt_user_id, a.crt_dt, a.upd_user_id, a.upd_dt ) VALUES ( b.auth_code, b.menu_code, b.pgm_trn_code, b.func_yn, b.user_id, sysdate, b.user_id, sysdate )
